tool_description: Returns key entities in a text including events, location, organization, person, titles, quanitites and much more. You can read a blog post on the API here: https://medium.com/p/9983b0311038/edit
name: Text Entities API
title: Text Entities API

api_list.name: text-entities
api_list.description: Returns entities from text such as locations, organizations, brand names, titles, quantities, people, and much more.
